rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area with a north-facing door aligning with Vastu principles for positive energy. Minimal decoration to suit the budget.
An open space that can serve as both living room and dining area, designed to promote social interaction while maintaining a clutter-free environment. Large windows for natural light from the south.
Functional kitchen with essential fixtures and storage, designed with north-east corner placement in mind for auspiciousness. Budget-friendly finishes used.
A compact guest bedroom ensuring privacy and comfort. Minimal furniture to maximize space under budget constraints.
Second guest bedroom, similar in layout and design as Guest Bedroom 1, placed for optimal feng shui balance.
A dedicated workspace with north-facing window to harness calm energy. Designed as a multi-purpose room that can double as study or additional guest space if required.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing north to ensure a positive flow of energy according to Vastu.
Large windows on the south side for maximum natural light.
Small balcony opening near kitchen to provide ventilation and an open feel.
